data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hello,

    Shell::Parser was primarily written to simplify
    Syntax::Highlight::Shell. It's a rudimentary shell parser which
    provides an event driven API, a little similar to HTML::Parser. I
    wrote this module because I didn't find any module on the CPAN which
    provides this task.

    Thanks for reading
